workItemFields.Microsoft.VSTS.TCM.Steps:
<steps id="0" last="10"><step id="2" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Открыть реестр Кандидаты<BR/>Срабатывает метод:<BR/>&nbsp;GET https://spektr-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/spektr/InjectionExpertise/GetGridPagination?orgId=6&amp;projectId=05dbf634-1c0a-47b2-9792-ff45cd68543d&amp;pageNumber=1&amp;pageSize=1000<BR/><BR/><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Время загрузки &lt; 5 сек</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="3" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P>Выбрать любую скважину<BR/>Открыть Боковую панель  "Статус экспертизы"<BR/>Срабатывают методы:<BR/><BR/>&nbsp;
GET https://spektr-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/spektr/InjectionWellInfo/GetLayersList?id=002291fd-0f22-4d9a-aad9-6cab0f0f0ec2

GET https://spektr-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/spektr/WellInfo/GetExpertiseHistory?wellExpertiseId=002291fd-0f22-4d9a-aad9-6cab0f0f0ec2<BR/>
GET https://spektr-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/spektr/WellInfo/GetWellComments?wellExpertiseId=002291fd-0f22-4d9a-aad9-6cab0f0f0ec2<BR/>
GET https://spektr-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/spektr/InjectionWellInfo/GetAdditionalInfo?id=002291fd-0f22-4d9a-aad9-6cab0f0f0ec2&amp;layerId=PL0224<BR/>
GET https://spektr-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/spektr/InjectionWellInfo/GetDiagnosticValues?id=002291fd-0f22-4d9a-aad9-6cab0f0f0ec2&amp;layerId=PL0224<BR/>
GET https://spektr-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/spektr/InjectionWellInfo/GetErrors?id=002291fd-0f22-4d9a-aad9-6cab0f0f0ec2&amp;layerId=PL0224<BR/>
GET https://spektr-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/spektr/InjectionWellInfo/GetExpertiseValues?id=002291fd-0f22-4d9a-aad9-6cab0f0f0ec2&amp;layerId=PL0224<BR/>
POST https://spektr-u210001901.apps.test.paas.gazprom-neft.local/api/users/userSettings/save<BR/>&nbsp;<BR/>&nbsp;<BR/><BR/>&nbsp;</P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><P>Время загрузки &lt; 5 сек</P></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="4" type="ValidateStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><DIV><P>Открыть Боковую панель  "Информация о скважине"
Срабатывают методы:
